title: Nurse Delegation and Supervision Competency Enhancement Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing practice knowledge and at least three years of practical experience
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education for in-service nurses based on mixed research methodologies, including case analysis and role-playing using digital devices

learning_goals: Nurses can clearly explain the scope of duties and responsibility distribution criteria when delegating tasks.
Learners can apply at least three effective communication strategies when supervising HCAs (Health Care Assistants).
Practitioners can resolve over 80% of delegation-related issues using a conflict management framework.
Trainees document and derive improvements from at least five real-world clinical delegation cases over four weeks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
